com.hcl.domino.html

Interface EmbeddedImage


  • public interface EmbeddedImage
    Interface gives access to referenced embedded images in the HTML conversion of rich text

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  EmbeddedImage.HTMLImageReader
      Callback interface that receives data of embedded images

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getFormat()
      Returns the image format, either "gif" or "jpg"
      String getImageSrcAttr()
      Returns img tag URL (src attribute value), can be used for string replacement if the image is stored locally on disk
      int getItemIndex()
      Returns the item index.
      String getItemName()
      Returns the name of the item that contains this image.
      int getItemOffset()
      Returns the item offset.
      Collection<String> getOptions()
      Use the HTML convert options used to render this embedded image.
      void readImage(EmbeddedImage.HTMLImageReader callback)
      Method to directly access the image data without storing it to disk
      void writeImage(OutputStream out)
      Convenience method to write the whole image to an output stream
      void writeImage(Path filePath)
      Convenience method to write the whole image to a file

    • Method Detail

      • getItemName

        String getItemName()
        Returns the name of the item that contains this image. Use the values of
        • getItemName()
        • getItemOffset()
        • getItemIndex()
        • getOptions()
        to locate the data for this image in the document via RichTextHTMLConverter.readEmbeddedImage(com.hcl.domino.data.Document, java.lang.String, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>, int, int, com.hcl.domino.html.EmbeddedImage.HTMLImageReader).
        Returns:
        item name

      • getItemOffset

        int getItemOffset()
        Returns the item offset. Use the values of
        • getItemName()
        • getItemOffset()
        • getItemIndex()
        • getOptions()
        to locate the data for this image in the document.
        Returns:
        item offset

      • getItemIndex

        int getItemIndex()
        Returns the item index. Use the values of
        • getItemName()
        • getItemOffset()
        • getItemIndex()
        • getOptions()
        to locate the data for this image in the document.
        Returns:
        item index

      • getOptions

        Collection<String> getOptions()
        Use the HTML convert options used to render this embedded image. Use the values of
        • getItemName()
        • getItemOffset()
        • getItemIndex()
        • getOptions()
        to locate the data for this image in the document.
        Returns:
        convert options

      • getImageSrcAttr

        String getImageSrcAttr()
        Returns img tag URL (src attribute value), can be used for string replacement if the image is stored locally on disk
        Returns:
        relative image URL

      • readImage

        void readImage(EmbeddedImage.HTMLImageReader callback)
        Method to directly access the image data without storing it to disk
        Parameters:
        callback - callback to receive data

      • writeImage

        void writeImage(Path filePath)
         throws IOException
        Convenience method to write the whole image to a file
        Parameters:
        filePath - image filepath
        Throws:
        IOException - on case of I/O errors

      • writeImage

        void writeImage(OutputStream out)
         throws IOException
        Convenience method to write the whole image to an output stream
        Parameters:
        out - stream
        Throws:
        IOException - on case of I/O errors

      • getFormat

        String getFormat()
        Returns the image format, either "gif" or "jpg"
        Returns:
        format
